translations: 继承（遗产）；经遗传获得（品质、身体特征等）；接手，承担；接收（前所有者的事物）；<古>（尤作圣经翻译和典故用语）得到

sentences.sentence: He has no son to inherit his land.
sentences.translation: 他没有儿子来继承他的土地。

sentences.sentence: Sheila will inherit everything in the event of his death.
sentences.translation: 他一旦故去，所有财产都由希拉继承。

sentences.sentence: We inherit from our parents many of our physical characteristics.
sentences.translation: 我们从父母的遗传中得到许多体貌特征。
